com.tomscz.af.showcase.view.controller

Class BaseController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.af.showcase.view.controller.BaseController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbsenceInstanceCreateController, AbsenceInstanceEditController, AbsenceTypeManagementController, AvaiableCountryController, MyAbsenceInstanceController, PersonController, WelcomeScreenController

    public abstract class BaseController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is abstract controller, which hold action in menu and localization bar. It has also some support method.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)
